## hpr3005 :: Is ActivityPub Paving The Way to Web 3.0?

 The ActivityPub Conference of 2019 was held in Prague. This is about a talk raising a suggestion that ActivityPub might be a way to implement Web 3.0. https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=1081
Links:

https://redaktor.me/apconf/
https://archive.org/details/apconf-talks/Talk2_Maloki_compressed.mov
https://medium.com/@maloki/does-mastodon-spark-joy-no-meet-florence-788bbc8b48c2
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fediverse
https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=1081
